nodes.text: Beesh legs were a type of food item that were rich in flavor and could be found on the planet Kubindi. In 0 BBY, the Kubaz Garindan ezz Zavor, who had consumed beesh legs at one point in his life, reminisced about tasting the legs and leevil pâté when he inhaled a multitude of scents in Mos Eisley spaceport on the desert planet Tatooine, realizing that it had been a considerable amount of time since he last tasted them.
Beesh legs were mentioned in "The Secrets of Long Snoot," a short story written by Delilah S. Dawson and published in the 2017 anthology From a Certain Point of View.
